articles.author: Yahoo News
articles.title: Republican Sen. Ben Sasse officially steps down, opening up appointment to seat
articles.description: Sen. Ben Sasse, a critic of former President Donald Trump, stepped down from the Senate as he prepares to become president of the University of Florida.
articles.content:
Sen. Ben Sasse, R-Neb., an outspoken critic of former President Donald Trump, officially resigned from the Senate on Sunday as he prepares to step back into academia as president of the University of Florida.
Sasse, who led Midland University, a smal... [2598 chars]

articles.title: Jim Durkin, House GOP leader, resigning seat in legislature
articles.description: After 24 years in the House and nine as GOP leader, the Western Springs lawmaker laments former President Trump's influence on Republicans.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Bolsonaro supporters invade Brazil presidential palace, Congress, Supreme Court
articles.description: Bolsonaro, an acolyte of Trump's who has yet to concede defeat, peddled the false claim that Brazil's electronic voting system was prone to fraud, spawning a violent movement of election deniers. The invasion poses an immediate problem for Lula, who was only inaugurated on Jan. 1 and has pledged to unite a nation torn by Bolsonaro's nationalist populism.
articles.content: Supporters of Brazil's far-right former President Jair Bolsonaro on Sunday invaded the country's Congress, presidential palace and Supreme Court, in a grim echo of the U.S. Capitol invasion two years ago by fans of former President Donald Trump. Left... [3824 chars]

articles.title: Outgoing Sen. Sasse knows Trump criticism shapes his legacy
articles.description: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) — Nebraska's outgoing U.S. Sen. Ben Sasse knows he may be remembered...
articles.content:
OMAHA, Neb. (AP) — Nebraska's outgoing U.S. Sen. Ben Sasse knows he may be remembered more for his criticisms of former President Donald Trump than for the policies he supported during his eight years in office.

articles.title: House GOP select panel will target DOJ and FBI and their 'ongoing criminal investigations'
articles.description: House Republicans are gearing up to investigate the Department of Justice and the FBI, including their "ongoing criminal investigations," setting up a showdown with the Biden administration and law enforcement agencies over their criminal probes, particularly those into former President Donald Trump.

articles.author: Cable News Network
articles.title: Donald Trump: McCarthy speaker saga shows former president is far from untouchable ahead of 2024
articles.description: Kevin McCarthy's seven-year-plus dream to become House speaker finally became reality early Saturday morning. The California Republican's tumultuous journey concluded after six Republican holdouts voted "present," allowing him to win on the 15th ballot with a lower majority threshold.

articles.title: Trump 'No Longer in Control' Former Congressman Warns After Speaker's Vote
articles.description: Former GOP lawmaker Carlos Curbelo said Sunday that he believed Trump's endorsement only swayed "two or three" holdouts for McCarthy.
articles.content:
Donald Trump may have lost control over the far-right groups in Congress he helped create following the contentious House speaker vote, according to one former GOP congressman.

articles.title: From Trump to Governor: Sanders Prepares to Take on New Role
articles.description: Since winning election, the 40-year-old Republican has largely avoided weighing in on the former president who endorsed her bid and appeared prominently in her campaign materials.
articles.content:
After running a campaign heavily focused on national politics and her time as President Donald Trump’s spokeswoman, Sarah Huckabee Sanders says she wants to keep her attention on Arkansas as she takes charge as the state’s 47th governor.
